message.raid_attracted: Your fleet has attracted the interest of a {{gov}} raiding party.
message.authorities_refuse_land: The authorities on {{planet}} refuse to let you land.
message.ships_will_no_formation: {{count}} {{noun}} will no longer fly in formation.
message.wormhole_navigate: Landing on a local wormhole to navigate to the {{system}} system.
message.autopilot_jump_fleet: Engaging fleet autopilot to jump to the {{name}} system. Your fleet will jump when ready.
message.autopilot_jump: Engaging autopilot to jump to the {{name}} system.
message.note_missions_require: Note: you have {{mission_label}} landing on {{list}} in the system you are jumping to.
message.authorities_refuse_clear: The authorities on this {{noun}} refuse to clear you to land here.
message.switching_landing: Switching landing targets. Now landing on {{name}}.
message.you_can_land_more: You can land on more than one {{types}} in this system. Landing on {{name}}.
message.destroyed_unable_orders: destroyed and unable to execute your orders.
message.unable_hail_hyperspace: Unable to send hail: {{noun}} is entering hyperspace.
message.unable_hail_not_inhabited: Unable to send hail: {{noun}} is not inhabited.
message.bribed_ship: You bribed a {{gov}} ship {{credits}} to refrain from attacking you today.
message.bribed_authorities: You bribed the authorities on {{planet}} {{credits}} to permit you to land.
